properties.label: xDome AP Location
properties.description: The location of the access point the device is connected to, extracted from Network Management integrations.

properties.label: xDome Authentication User
properties.description: The User name used to authenticate the device to the network using Radius/802.1x is extracted from the NAC integration and the traffic.

properties.label: xDome Connection Type
properties.description: The connection types of a device, such as "Ethernet".

properties.label: xDome Category
properties.description: The device category group (see "About Device Categorization" in the Knowledge Base).

properties.label: xDome Subcategory
properties.description: The device sub-category group (see "About Device Categorization" in the Knowledge Base).

properties.label: xDome Type
properties.description: The device type group (see "About Device Categorization" in the Knowledge Base).

properties.label: xDome Enforcement/Auth. Profile
properties.description: The device's Enforcement/Authorization Profiles extracted from the Cisco ISE and Aruba ClearPass integrations.

properties.label: xDome Equipment Class
properties.description: Determines the equipment class of the device, according to The Joint Commission (TJC).

properties.label: xDome First Seen
properties.description: The date and time a device's NIC was first seen.

properties.label: xDome Last Seen
properties.description: The date and time a device's NIC was last seen.

properties.label: xDome Hostname (HTTP)
properties.description: The unique hostname identifier of the device, extracted from HTTP protocol traffic.

properties.label: xDome IP Assignment
properties.description: The device's IP assignment method, extracted from DHCP protocol traffic.

properties.label: xDome Label
properties.description: The labels added to the xDome device manually or automatically.

properties.label: xDome Manufacturer
properties.description: Manufacturer of the device.

properties.label: xDome Model
properties.description: The device's model.

properties.label: xDome Risk Score
properties.description: The calculated risk level of a device.

properties.label: xDome Site Name
properties.description: The name of the site within the organization the xDome device is associated with.

properties.label: xDome Hostname (SNMP)
properties.description: The unique hostname identifier of the device, extracted from SNMP protocol traffic.

properties.label: xDome SSID
properties.description: The name of the wireless network the device is connected to.

properties.label: xDome Switch Location
properties.description: The location of the switch the device is connected to.

properties.label: xDome Switch Port ID
properties.description: The port identifier of the switch the device is connected to.

properties.label: xDome Device ID
properties.description: A universal unique identifier (UUID) for the device.

properties.label: xDome OS
properties.description: The aggregated value of OS name, version and revision.

properties.label: xDome Status
properties.description: A boolean field indicating whether the device is online or not.
